ygData.subject: RE: Trading Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: These are the most fun raids.  Small groups like this tend to be more efficient than organized.  The challenge and the desire to avoid even a single mistake
ygData.messageBody:
These are the most fun raids. Small groups like this tend to be more
efficient than organized. The challenge and the desire to avoid even a
single mistake make these the most fun moments in the game. So far the
smallest group we've taken is 10, with no casualties. I'm thinking its
doable with 6.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 3:36 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Trading Advice


our normal FG raids are 12 ppl and easily done. just takes good teamwork
and the right class balance, which i know you are good at Harm. you'll be
able to do it with 12 level 50s easy.

Shada

> Mithril Arms, Mithril Legs. You've got to take at least, and I
> mean least, 3 full groups of L45+ to get.
>
